SELECT
FROM solarev.ocpp_charge_point_settings cps INNER JOIN solarev.ocpp_charge_point cp ON cp.id = cps.cp_id WHERE cps.cp_id = #{id}

SELECT
FROM solarev.ocpp_charge_point_settings cps INNER JOIN solarev.ocpp_charge_point cp ON cp.id = cps.cp_id
ORDER BY ocpp_charge_point_settings_cp_id

SELECT cp.id AS ocpp_charge_point_settings_cp_id , cp.user_id AS ocpp_charge_point_user_id , COALESCE(cps.created, us.created) AS ocpp_charge_point_settings_created , COALESCE(cps.pub_in, TRUE) AS ocpp_charge_point_settings_pub_in , COALESCE(cps.pub_flux, TRUE) AS ocpp_charge_point_settings_pub_flux , COALESCE(cps.source_id_tmpl, us.source_id_tmpl) AS ocpp_charge_point_settings_source_id_tmpl FROM solarev.ocpp_charge_point cp LEFT OUTER JOIN solarev.ocpp_user_settings us ON us.user_id = cp.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN solarev.ocpp_charge_point_settings cps ON cps.cp_id = cp.id WHERE cp.id = #{id} AND cp.user_id = #{userId} AND (us.created IS NOT NULL OR cps.created IS NOT NULL)
